description:
This is a market on whether whether the yield of the United States 30-Year Treasury Bond will be at 3.0001% or more as of market close on August 19, 2022. 

If the yield of the US 30-Year T-Bond is at 3.0001% or greater as of market close on the resolution date, this market will resolve to “Yes”. If the yield of the US 30-Year T-Bond is less than 3.0001% as of market close on the resolution date, this market will resolve to “No”.  

If for any reason (e.g. market holiday, emergency market closure) there is no close price for this market's resolution date, the close price of the nearest previous date will be used.  

The resolution source for this market will be Yahoo Finance's reporting on the values offered by the ICE Futures Real Time Price, found at (https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/%5ETYX/history). The resolution will be based on the value listed in the column labelled “Close*” in the row titled with the resolution date. If Yahoo Finance is unavailable, CNBC may be used instead.

markets.question: Will U.S. 30 year Treasury bond yield close above 3% on August 19, 2022?

title: Will U.S. 30 year Treasury bond yield close above 3% on August 19, 2022?
